item.title: Hello!
item.description: I’m a rising senior studying Information Systems at Carnegie Mellon University, with an additional major in Computer Science. I’m originally from Singapore, but am currently based in Pittsburgh! Currently, I’m interested in: Distributed systems and consensus Cloud infrastructure and automation Langchain, vector databases The similarities between chinese and italian cuisine Building bikes Software Engineering Internship @ GovTech (2021) Software Engineering Internship @ Razer (2020) Research on Concentrated Liqudity Market Makers @ Algorand (2022) Open Source Contribution to Zulip (2022) Psst, have you heard this (2021) Token Swapping Decentralized App (2022)
